attributes.action: ask his Government to replace MP salaries with a means-tested benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Replacing salary with a means tested benefit equivalent to the salary after deductions will remind MPs that their role is not a career (ie primarily for their own benefit) but a public service. It will help them focus on their role by reducing the incentive to hold multiple additional jobs. It might even give them a greater empathy with others who live on benefits!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
